item.title: LFST
item.description: score:8 Chances: LifeStance Health Group, Inc. has seen a surge in revenue and clinician expansion, indicating positive growth in the outpatient mental health sector. The company operates in 32 states and offers mental health services both in-person and virtually, demonstrating a wide reach and adaptability to changing healthcare trends.
